Shadowstride Rebuke.name: Shadowstride Rebuke
Shadowstride Rebuke.flavor: As your foe sets up to attack a nearby ally, you appear next to it and drive it back.
Shadowstride Rebuke.trigger: A creature you can see hits or misses an ally
Shadowstride Rebuke.effect: You teleport a number of squares equal to your speed and make the following melee attack.
Shadowstride Rebuke.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. The target is subject to your divine sanction until the end of your next turn.

Tumultuous Shadowflow.name: Tumultuous Shadowflow
Tumultuous Shadowflow.flavor: Shadow flows around your blade then surges over your foe after your attack.
Tumultuous Shadowflow.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target takes a -2 penalty to all attacks and cannot benefit from concealment.

Cover of Night.name: Cover of Night
Cover of Night.flavor: Darkness swirls around your ally, who then seems to vanish like a wisp of smoke.
Cover of Night.target: You or one ally in the burst
Cover of Night.effect: The target becomes invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks.
